title: How to Translate a Google Drive Document

steps.title: Open up the document you wish to translate.
steps.content: Open up the document you wish to translate.

steps.title: Enter the title of the translated articled, then press the drop down menu to select a language.
steps.content: Enter the title of the translated articled, then press the drop down menu to select a language.

steps.title: Select the language you wish to translate the document into.
steps.content: Select the language you wish to translate the document into.

steps.title: Press the "Translate" button to begin the translation.
steps.content: Press the "Translate" button to begin the translation.

steps.title: You will be transferred to a new page which will have your translated document.
steps.content: You will be transferred to a new page which will have your translated document.
